website_summaries.verdict: A step up from most budget bongos, with handy features such as easy tuning hardware.
pros: Dual wood shell construction adds extra strength and rigidity to the bongo set
Easy to tune with the high-quality hardware and included tuning key
cons: Drumheads are less durable than natural skins

customer_reviews.title: I may have to kill her soon
customer_reviews.text: Very respectable bongos. I'm buying more, for myself, my wife, and as gifts. Seriously. A quality purchase. I'm not a professional drummer or musician. Look to other reviewers for comments on that. These bongos simply strike me as extremely well made, and have proven lots of good fun. --Not so seriously: my wife can't keep a beat. I may have to kill her soon: she loves to, dare I say, bang on di drums all day! ... at least at parties. Oh, and I love my wife. Don't buy these for your wife if you hate her, or if she hates you. She'll drive you up the wall.
customer_reviews.author: GAL

customer_reviews.title: I Chose Wisely
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my 16 year old niece. She already plays the electric bass, violin & ukelale. We saw her grab a set of bongos during a concert and knew she needed her own. She was blown away when she opened her gift and spent the rest of the day playing. My husband, who plays the electric guitar, said I "chose wisely'! Beautiful construction, loved the wood selection, great sound - couldn't ask for better .... so I guess I going with Pyle's reputation was a wise choice.
customer_reviews.author: E. Barz

customer_reviews.title: Looks and sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these today and have been playing on them for the last hour and a half. I love em! They sound great and are well crafted so they look nice too. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hollowell

customer_reviews.title: Ver Good For The Price
customer_reviews.text: The sound is about as good as you'll get from a cheap pair of small drums. The construction of the drums is respectable. The hardware is nothing special, but for the price it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Joey The Squash

customer_reviews.title: little Harrison is very happy and loves his present
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of Pyle Tunable Bongos for my grandson Harrison's Birthday, hi dad Alex has sent me his verdict on the Instrument ; after having thoroughly tested and examined it's construction, Alex informs me that quality of the Bongos is up to a very high standard and the finish of the Instrument is flawless .Also comments, little Harrison is very happy and loves his present ,as the purchaser of this item,I'm glad that I made the right choice with this set, which without question I very much recommend. OscarL.
customer_reviews.author: OscarL.

customer_reviews.title: Comes dirty and used
customer_reviews.text: Awful came so dirty and beyond used one side was yellow one side was white full of webs of some type just pure filthy Had to give one star it would not allow me to give zero stars
customer_reviews.author: Tammy & Patrick Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great bongos!
customer_reviews.text: Just received them, got them tuned up and they sound great! Started making noise on them and got just what I hoped for. It's hard when you buy something like this online and don't get a chance to hear them first but was not disappointed​ this time. They're solid and well built, tuning them was simple and a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new bongos
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bongos! They look beautiful, they sound beautiful - looking forward to making them a part of the band! And really affordable - I was afraid I wouldn't be able to get any but surprise! These are great :)
customer_reviews.author: Sondra D.

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want a bummer of a birthday!  - Huge tear in drum head on arrival...
customer_reviews.text: Huge tear in the head when my son opened it up on his birthday - serious quality control issues. Don't recommend - you are taking your chances.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great bongo's!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband who has no musical training or talent at all and he's having a blast with them! We don't know anything about drums but these seem very well made, especially for the reasonable price so don't hesitate ordering these.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality hardware - fit together poorly also color was disappointingly slightly different
customer_reviews.author: John Casey

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: These bongos are well made and have a beautiful finish. This made a great gift for my son. For the price I was expecting less but I was very pleased with the construction of them.
customer_reviews.author: Apolinar Zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: quality item
customer_reviews.text: My musical grandson loved these drums! Well made and attractive, they took me back to my bongo days in the late 50's . My son has cheerfully offered to kill me and my grandson will not put them down. Success!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s Quality for the value . Can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this to practice my sticks. I have ended Playing around with the correct use. lol but best gift I’ve bought for myself in a long time. I don’t have space for a drum set and this works just for what, I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: les

customer_reviews.title: They sound good even though they don't cost too much
customer_reviews.text: I received the bongos in a timely manner from the supplier. They arrived in new condition. My son loves them and I actually also to also play with them. They sound good even though they don't cost too much. I recommend this set to for any kid or beginner.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Joining the drum circle now
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about wooden bongo drums? Nice sound from this solid wood and the tuning key is great to get the sound where you want it.
customer_reviews.author: A Nuclear Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product, loved them, phenomenal price!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were great for the money! Was going to pay more on fb marketplace until I found these. Glad I did, they worked great! And fast ship!
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: They are an excellent quality, and impressive value
customer_reviews.text: They are an excellent quality, and impressive value. Good sound and design. My guitar playing has not improved, but my daughters love the drum, so it's helping us practice more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffv44

customer_reviews.title: Fair Value
customer_reviews.text: I like the set but the kids gravitate towards the big drum everytime. I am not an expert but I too grab the big one when it is available.

customer_reviews.title: So well crafted!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted! Got them for my daughter and sensory play.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: This Father's Day gift was a hit! Substantial natural materials are beautiful and the sound is delightful. Appreciate the double packing so that the item arrived safely

customer_reviews.title: Ripped my bongo and my heart apart
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to act like Sheldon off of the show the Big Bang theory when these came in. Unfortunately one has a tear all the way across it. I don’t have time to ship it back or anything of the other million things so I’m just stuck with a broken bongo.

customer_reviews.title: Really?

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but slight damage in shipment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for grandson. Nice looking bongo good tone right out of box. Some damage in shipping as head block had come loose and movement during shipping chipped off finish around mount but after repositioning and tightening not much shows. Other thab light damage during shipment would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: michael bucknam

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Although our home has gotten louder these are great for our kid band!

customer_reviews.title: Came used bought new
customer_reviews.text: They litrally came used. I can tel cuz they scratched they got dirt and so many other signs of use.

customer_reviews.title: These bongos are every bit as good as the higher priced
customer_reviews.text: These bongos are every bit as good as the higher priced, expensive models. We are enjoying them, and will for many years to come!!
customer_reviews.author: DBM

customer_reviews.title: They look sturdy, well made and just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson and have not get given them to him. They look sturdy, well made and just as pictured.

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value for bongo drums!
customer_reviews.text: I got the item very quickly and in great condition. I tuned the drums and the sound was amazing. These drums would be great for either children or adults, and are very easy to play. I am very happy with my purchase and will buy from Pyle Products again.
customer_reviews.author: LiangChen57

customer_reviews.title: a great Christmas gift,
customer_reviews.text: these are a lot of fun, appear to be well crafted and were very well received. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these bongos...he's impressed with the quality and I'm thrilled that he is thrilled...based on what he says...highly recommend!

customer_reviews.text: The product is great but it’s missing a rubber screw protectors. I would like if I can have a rubber shipped please. That’s the only thing that’s missing for a five star review. Thank you!!

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for my 4 year old. Otherwise, great.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old already broke them, but kid is crazy.

customer_reviews.text: The bongos are well built and have a good sound. They will be great for my grandson who is just starting to get interested in playing.

customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a Christmas gift but I can tell you I was blown away by the quality of these bongos.

product_meta.title: Pyle Hand Crafted Bongo Drums - Pair of Wooden Bongo Drums, 6.5 & 7.5 Inch - PBND10
product_meta.description:
Pyle Model : PBND10

WOODEN SHELL BONGO DRUMS
HAND-CRAFTED WOODEN BONGOS - BONGO DRUMS
Features:Classic/Traditional Bongo StyleHand-Crafted Dual Wooden ShellsNatural ‘True Skin’ Animal Hide HeadsAcoustical Percussion Tone SoundTune-able Drum DesignMetal Chrome-Plated HardwareIncludes Tuning Key WrenchTwo-Toned Wood Panels with Glossy FinishLightweight & Compact Tabletop DesignMusical Fun for All Ages!
Technical Specs:Bongo Size/Diameters: 6.5’’, 7.5’’Drum Construction Material: Birch WoodTotal Size (L x W x H): 16.0’’ x 7.0’’ x 8.0’’
The Pyle Hand-Crafted Bongo Drums feature hand-crafted wooden shells. Classic and traditional bongo style makes them the perfect pair for beginner and experienced players of all ages. The natural ‘true skin’ animal hide head covers reproduce clean acoustical percussion sounds. Additional bongo features include tune-able heads with chrome-plated hardware, two-toned side panels with glossy finish, along with an included tuning key wrench. Add some sound, and style, with the Pyle Wooden Bongo Drums.
feature_bullets: Hand-crafted Drums: Jazz up the tone of your music with Pyle Wooden bongo drums. A pair of hand-crafted wooden shell bongo drums of diameters 6.5" and 7.5". This set of classic/traditional bongo drums is perfect for beginners and experienced players

Amazing Sounds: The drum head is a pure natural 'true skin' animal hide, head delivers a crystal clear acoustical percussion sound. Features tuneable heads with chrome-plated hardware and a tuning key wrench. Work together to produce amazing sounds
Safe for All Ages: This bongo drums set has no sharp edges, therefore it is particularly safe for children. It comes with rounded rims which allows you to hold your drums in any position you like

Extremely Sturdy and Durable: The wood, the metals and the skin are all made of top quality materials which translates to improved sound quality as well as sturdiness and durability. This set of drums is ready to stick with you for years
Perfect Gift Idea: This sleek pair of bongo drums is a perfect gift for yourself, friends and loved ones it it'll be really appreciated. It's perfect for kids and adults of all ages

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars161 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
